metadata.Title: CVE-2022-2157 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: Use after free in Interest groups in Google Chrome prior to 103.0.5060.53allowed a remote attacker who had compromised the renderer process topotentially exploit heap corruption via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
